description: Mock embeddings for test data (text-embedding-3-small dimension: 1536)

chunk_001.note: In actual tests, use numpy to generate realistic embeddings or fixed seeds

what_is_atom.note: Query about atoms should match chunk_001

periodic_table.note: Query about periodic table should match chunk_002

chemical_bonds.note: Query about chemical bonds should match chunk_003

water.note: Query about water should match chunk_004

chemical_reactions.note: Query about reactions should match chunk_005

usage_note: In actual tests, use mock patches to return these embeddings instead of calling OpenAI API. Example: @patch('openai.Embedding.create', return_value={'data': [{'embedding': mock_embedding}]})
